thread.title: New concert dates: Santana, John Legend, Deftones

author: chron.com
title: New concert dates: Santana, John Legend, Deftones

Their tour with Paul Abdul and Boyz II Men hits Toyota Cente ron May 20. New Kids on the Block is again hanging tough. Their tour with Paul Abdul and Boyz II Men hits Toyota Cente ron May 20. Photo: James Nielsen, Staff Image 70 of 70 New concert dates: Santana, John Legend, Deftones 1 / 70 Back to Gallery The seemingly ageless Carlos Santana will bring his band Santana to the Smart Financial Centre in Sugar Land on July 3.
Santana is on the Transmogrifier Tour, which defies the typical tour construct of naming it after an artist's most recent album. Santana last year reunited with some members of his late-'60s band for "Santana IV." Maybe IV sounded too medical. Or maybe he's a fan of machines made of cardboard boxes .
Regardless tickets go on sale at 10 a.m. Feb. 10 through Ticketmaster .
This already has been a busy week for show announcements. Lady Gaga this morning followed her Super Bowl appearance with an announcement of a World Tour that hits Houston in December .
And the Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion continues to unveil its summer lineup. The venue announced a John Legend date on May 21 and a twofer of Deftones and Rise Against on June 26. Jimmy Eat World and Incubus will play there Aug. 4. Ticket info available here .
